title: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: When using the shortcut 'Shift + Ctrl + Right' to make a selection, the 'Add Import' feature should ignore any leading or trailing whitespace within the selection. Currently, when using 'Ctrl+M' to add an import, nothing happens if there is trailing whitespace within the selection. This issue needs to be fixed.
EB: When making a selection using 'Shift + Ctrl + Right' and then using 'Ctrl+M' to add an import, the 'Node' keyword is displayed as 'Node ' (with a trailing whitespace).
SR: The 'Add Import' feature should consistently ignore any leading or trailing whitespace within the selected text when using 'Ctrl+M'.
